ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: I would always rather do the hasting than the enchanter, BUT I don t like telling people what to do with their character.  I let them know I can hast everyone,
ygData.messageBody:
I would always rather do the hasting than the enchanter, BUT I don't
like telling people what to do with their character. I let them know I
can hast everyone, but if they still want to, I try to find other things
to do.

I only get annoyed with enchanters when they start casting DD/DOT's. To
be honest the mana effiency on those spells are pretty awful (maybe I'm
wrong, I haven't played my enchanter in a LONG time).
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
